entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
